parameters

Class NoiseParameter

  • java.lang.Object
    • parameters.Parameter
      • parameters.NoiseParameter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NoiseParameter
extends Parameter
    This is a children class of Parameter. It encapsulate the behavior of the background noise during playing during the experiment to disturb the subject.
    Author:
    Jean-Etienne Salois, Philippe de SÃ¨ve
    See Also:
    Parameter, Serialized Form

      • orderOfPlay

        public java.lang.Object[] orderOfPlay(int seed)
        orderOfPlay implementation. Implements the behavior of the parameter when it is to be played during a block. The function uses a seed to generate a random sequence of stimulus to be played.
        Specified by:
        orderOfPlay in class Parameter
        Parameters:
        seed - seed used to generate stimulus sequence
        Returns:
        the order, a string table, composed with the name of the noise file
        See Also:
        Block
